about_the_game:
"You and I both live on borrowed time."

A story of two people trying to get back their lost time and memories together.


Chikaro is an adventure game based on out-of-body experiences.

The Story

Yokaze is a boy with magical powers, and Sigmo is an android girl.
They wake up, without their memories, in a post-apocalyptic world full of dangerous robots konwn as "amporphi," who threaten the existence of the few who still live above the ground.

Yokaze and Sigmo want to know who or what they are. His powers let him summon intentions, a faint trace left behind by those who have passed away. By following the trail of these intentions, the two gradually learn more about the past in a journey that will take them to the very core of this world.

Out-of-body Experiences

By leaving his body and becoming a soul, he can pass through walls or go into enemies' bodies to possess and control them.

Intentions

The intentions of those who have passed away still remain as faint traces scattered throughout the world.
When Yokaze, with his magic powers, comes in contact with them, he can read the memories left in those traces.

short_description: A boy and an android girl wake up without their memories in a world where deadly robots roam the streets. With the boy's powers, they can leave their bodies to walk through walls or possess enemies. The two follow the trail of the intentions left behind by those who once perished above the ground.
